name: samjones
description: Samjones is a Native PHP MVC CMS web framework, open-source created from scratch by Ludwig Bethnicer and meant to take in building or developed dynamic web application with PHP following the model–view–controller architectural pattern and based on Wordpress.

scripts.test: This PHP MVC CMS framework is intended for those starters or beginners in learing programming and web development using PHP.

author: Ludwig Bethnicer Cagas-Napigkit
